subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mattioli, tired of the daily grind, bought a spinach farm in northeast Pennsylvania in 1960 and transformed it into one of the primary stock-car racetracks.
snippet: Mr. Mattioli, tired of the daily grind, bought a spinach farm in northeast Pennsylvania in 1960 and transformed it into one of the primary stock-car racetracks.
